scripts.build:all: ng build angular-material-datetime-picker && ng build angular-material-moment-adapter && ng build angular-material-color-picker && ng build angular-material-file-input
scripts.publish:datetime-picker: ng build angular-material-datetime-picker && cd dist/angular-material-datetime-picker && npm publish --access public && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish:moment-adapter: ng build angular-material-moment-adapter && cd dist/angular-material-moment-adapter && npm publish --access public  && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish:color-picker: ng build angular-material-color-picker && cd dist/angular-material-color-picker && npm publish --access public  && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish:file-input: ng build NgxMatFileInput && cd dist/angular-material-components-file-input && npm publish --access public  && cd .. && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish: ng build angular-material-datetime-picker && ng build angular-material-moment-adapter && ng build angular-material-color-picker && ng build angular-material-file-input && ng-packagr -p projects/angular-material-datetime-picker/ng-package.json && ng-packagr -p projects/angular-material-moment-adapter/ng-package.json && ng-packagr -p projects/angular-material-color-picker/ng-package.json && ng-packagr -p projects/angular-material-file-input/ng-package.json
